charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] found May and
Wallace battling on the beach.
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1201_0200: How wonderful! That was an amazing battle!
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_0401_0500: I am! I just had a great battle against Wallace!
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_0402_0700: That’s right! Blaziken and I did our best!
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1201_0800:
We’re both fired up because we want to
become even stronger!
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1201_0900:
I’m wearing this sygna suit so my feelings can
be in sync with Blaziken’s!
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1201_1000:
We were doing special training on the beach,
where there are lots of sync pairs with
Water-type Pokémon Blaziken is weak against!
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1201_1100:
While we were doing that, I saw Wallace, so I
asked him for a battle.
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1201_1200:
She had such a serious look on her face, I couldn’t
refuse her request.
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1201_1300:
Milotic and I accepted her challenge and faced her
in battle.
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1201_1400:
Thanks to Wallace, I feel like I’ve gotten
even stronger!
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1201_1500:
I want to keep this pace up and continue getting
stronger with Blaziken!
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_0401_1700:
Of course! Blaziken and I have been friends since
he was a Torchic! We traveled all over
Hoenn together!
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_0302_1800: You two seem to get along great.
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_0402_1900:
You betcha! I’ve known Blaziken since he was
a Torchic.
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1201_2000:
We’ve battled Brendan and his Pokémon lots of
times in the past.
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1201_2100:
Through experiencing all sorts of battles, Torchic
evolved all the way into Blaziken.
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1201_2200:
Even though his appearance has changed, our
feelings towards each other are still the same!
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1201_2300:
He’ll always be my precious partner. That will
never change!
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1201_2400:
I see... So that’s the source of the strength you
and Blaziken have.
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1201_2600:
I’ll let you both in on something. We have a goal
that we’re working towards.
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1201_2700:
We want to beat Brendan, Steven, and all the
friends we’ve met here on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1201_2800:
All the things I’ve seen, felt, and experienced
on Pasio have made me who I am today...
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1201_2900:
Now I want to show everyone what Blaziken and I
are made of!
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1201_3000: I know it might be an unrealistic goal...
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1201_3200:
I have no doubt in my mind that the two of you
will continue to spread your wings and fly
toward a bright future.
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1201_3300:
Defeating Steven may not be such a
far-off dream.
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1201_3400:
When you say it like that, I can’t help but
feel confident!
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1201_3500:
You know who else is on my list of friends I want
to battle?
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1201_3600:
You, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! So you
better be ready!
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_0302_3900: I’ll train a bunch and be waiting!
charaepi_ch0126_10_haruka/2301_1201_4100:
I’m really looking forward to the day we can
do that!
